name: Final Expense Whole Life
features: Simplified‐issue final expense via telephone health questionnaire (Parts 1–3)
Height/weight build chart determines SIMPL Preferred, SIMPL Standard, or MWL (page 5)
No paramedical exam, APS, bloodwork, or labs—decision based solely on build chart and questionnaire
PreCheck® mobile tool (Rate Check, Rx Check, UW Check) available via smartphone for rapid risk assessment (pages 6–11)
Telephonic processing center (TPC) obtains complete phone interview; agent portal integration for e‐App or phone app (pages 11–15)
Riders available: Accidental Death & Dismemberment, Children's Term Rider, Grandchild Rider, Waiver of Premium (refer to rider insert in agent kit)
